structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

law.text: All rights guaranteed by KRS Chapter 210 to mentally ill persons shall apply to individuals with an intellectual disability.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 42, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 32, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 3, effective March 6, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 37, effective July 1, 1982. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 328, sec. 6.

metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 38 would have amended this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
